recipes.label: The Burning Key
recipes.startdescription: This rite is the Key that will allow the Forge of Days to enter me. I will be changed forever.
recipes.description: The Rite is complete. The Marks of the Forge are upon me. The First Mark is what I have said, and the second is what I have done. If I inspect my body, I'll find the Third. I am aglow with new needs.

recipes.comments: male and female flavour; //TODO implement more elegantly
recipes.label: The Sighing Key
recipes.startdescription: This rite is the Key that will allow the Red Grail to enter me. I will be changed forever.
recipes.description: The Rite is complete. The Marks of the Grail are upon me. The First Mark is what I have said, and the second is what I have done. If I inspect my body, I'll find the Third. I thrill with new appetites.

recipes.comments: male and female flavour; //TODO implement more elegantly
recipes.label: The Sighing Key
recipes.startdescription: This rite is the Key that will allow the Red Grail to enter me. I will be changed forever.
recipes.description: The Rite is complete. The Marks of the Grail are upon me. The First Mark is what I have said, and the second is what I have done. If I inspect my body, I'll find the Third. I thrill with new appetites.

recipes.label: Preferences
recipes.startdescription: I've gone as far as I can in dream. I must perform the Work. But perhaps, when I consider my desires, it's not usually men that come to mind...
recipes.description: Tastes alter, desires change, thoughts bend to other forms.

recipes.label: Preferences
recipes.startdescription: I've gone as far as I can in dream. I must perform the Work. But perhaps, when I consider my desires, it's not usually women that come to mind...
recipes.description: Tastes alter, desires change, thoughts bend to other forms.

recipes.label: The Blinding Key
recipes.startdescription: This rite is the Key that will allow the Watchman's gaze to enter me. I will be changed forever.
recipes.description: The Rite is complete. The Marks of the Watchman are upon me. The First Mark is what I have said, and the second is what I have done. If I inspect my body, I'll find the Third. My hungers have been refined, now.

recipes.label: THE DAWN IS COME
recipes.startdescription: [This text is available when advanced legacies arrive.]
recipes.description: Remember that the ending text will contain the payload.

recipes.label: The Conflagration of the Heart
recipes.startdescription: I have been in the flame so many times. The plates of my flesh grate one against another. I conjure now the heat of the Forge, which will sear from me what I was. I will die as I pass the Tricuspid Gate, but death is not the end. I will be immortal: a Long, favoured of the Forge. [Any Follower used in the ritual will be consumed. If you care about whom you might leave behind, be careful.]
recipes.comments: Cleanup pre-recipe; remove any extraneous elements that might confuse final triggers

recipes.label: The Conflagration of the Heart
recipes.description: I am becoming a name of fire. Remember that the ending text will contain the payload.

recipes.label: THE FEAST IS NIGH
recipes.startdescription: [This text is available when advanced legacies arrive.]
recipes.description: The Feast is beginning. Remember that the ending text will contain the payload.

recipes.label: The Feast of the Heart's Remembrance
recipes.startdescription: I am swollen with the lives of others. The seams of my body begin to rupture. Now I invoke the Red Grail, who is the Mother of Mountains, who Consumes, who is the Source. One is here who loved me and whom perhaps I have loved, as perhaps the Red Grail loved the Thunderskin before his end. With this sacrifice, the invocation is both easier and more terrible. In Her Name I will give birth to myself. The Tricuspid Gate opens. I will be immortal: a Long, favoured of the Grail, and one who loved me will be remembered as long as I endure.

recipes.label: The Feast of the True Birth
recipes.startdescription: I am swollen with the lives of others. The seams of my body begin to rupture. Now I invoke the Red Grail, who is the Mother of Mountains, who Consumes, who is the Source. In Her Name I will give birth to myself. The Tricuspid Gate opens. I will be immortal: a Long, favoured of the Grail. [Any Follower used in the ritual will be consumed. If you care about whom you might leave behind, be careful.]
recipes.comments: Cleanup pre-recipe; remove any extraneous elements that might confuse final triggers

recipes.label: The Feast of the True Birth
The Feast of the True Birth
The Feast of the True Birth
THE LANTERN
recipes.startdescription: [This text is available when advanced legacies arrive.]
recipes.description: I am approaching the Glory. Remember that the ending text will contain the payload.

recipes.label: The Threshold Choice
recipes.startdescription: The final farewell. They will remain, and I will ascend.

slots.label: Decision
slots.description: [Add Passion to turn aside from your ascent... and live as a mortal with your beloved. Do nothing to continue.]

recipes.label: Love?
recipes.startdescription: I heard a story once: of scales where one pan held a heart, and the other a feather. This the choice I now make, though the feather be eternity. [This choice will abort your Ascension, and make the choice to live as a mortal with your beloved Auclair.]

recipes.label: Love?
recipes.startdescription: I heard a story once: of scales where one pan held a heart, and the other a feather. This the choice I now make, though the feather be eternity. [This choice will abort your Ascension, and make the choice to live as a mortal with Cat Caro.]

recipes.startdescription: I heard a story once: of scales where one pan held a heart, and the other a feather. This the choice I now make, though the feather be eternity. [This choice will abort your Ascension, and make the choice to live as a mortal with Clovette.]

recipes.label: Dedication
recipes.startdescription: Perhaps they love me. Perhaps I love them. Perhaps none of that matters.

recipes.label: The Incursus
recipes.startdescription: Little of this flesh remains. I will pass through the Tricuspid Gate and I will not return. The Watchman awaits me. In His footsteps, I will find the Glory's light. The understanding is too much for my soul to hold, and so my soul will open. I will not be immortal: I will be more than that. [Any Follower used in the ritual will be consumed. If you care about whom you might leave behind, be careful.]
recipes.comments: Cleanup pre-recipe; remove any extraneous elements that might confuse final triggers

recipes.label: Exotic Cravings?
recipes.startdescription: What hungers drive us?

recipes.label: Rivalry!
recipes.comments: That requirement is strictly unnecessary, but leaving it here just in case we move recipe connections again - it's an important filter
recipes.startdescription: Here is another who would ascend before me. [Independent occultists will try to monopolise the attention of the Hours. They may also conduct other schemes, whether you like it or not.]

recipes.label: A Pretender Victorious
recipes.startdescription: My Rival's achievements eclipse my own. Now they will ascend to a place in the House of the Sun, while here, in the world, I will remain alone with my frustrations.

recipes.label: Too Many Enemies
recipes.startdescription: One immortal enemy is a mortal peril. Two immortal enemies are too much. Our Great Work has failed.

recipes.label: Rebellion!
recipes.startdescription: Too much, or not enough? Whatever I've done, it's angered someone beyond forbearance.
recipes.description: An ally has broken away from me. They might not be an enemy - not yet - not exactly - but they will no longer serve me.

recipes.label: Discontent
recipes.startdescription: Too much, or not enough? Whatever I've done, it's angered an ally.
recipes.description: This one has spent some time in sulky solitude. For now, they'll return to the fold.

recipes.label: TO INFECT AND BECOME
recipes.startdescription: My appetite has become a thing beyond me, but not outside me. My abdomen pullulates with fruitfulness. It is too late.

recipes.label: Mortal Frustrations
recipes.startdescription: What hungers drive me?
recipes.description: As yet, I have only the needs and desires of any other mortal. But what stirs in me?

recipes.label: The Forge's Roar
recipes.startdescription: I am never quite warm enough, now.
recipes.description: I have dreamed of the Forge, and I long for the heat of her flames. It is almost time to perform the Work and begin the changes - but I must have enough Forge-aspect. Exploration might find more.

recipes.label: The Watchman's Light
recipes.startdescription: Even in waking hours, I have begun to see new colours.
recipes.description: My curiosity is becoming a physical need. My eyes will be thresholds. It is almost time to perform the Work and begin the changes - but I must have enough Lantern-aspect. Exploration might find more.

recipes.label: The Grail's Touch
recipes.startdescription: My desires are changing.
recipes.description: The Grail's wonderful tides move in me. It is almost time to perform the Work and begin the changes - but I must have enough Grail-aspect. Exploration might find more.

recipes.label: The Grail's Touch
recipes.startdescription: My desires are changing.
recipes.description: The Grail has touched me with her wonderful fingers. It is almost time to perform the Work and begin the changes - but I must have enough Grail-aspect. Exploration might find more.

recipes.label: The Forge's Glow
recipes.startdescription: Hunger burns in my heart - hunger for the power the invisible arts might bring.
recipes.description: The Forge of Days waits in my dreams. If I learn the Forge's lore, and I dream of this temptation, I can advance my purpose. The need gnaws at me.

recipes.label: The Watchman's Footsteps
recipes.startdescription: Hunger glows in my brain - hunger for the knowledge the invisible arts might bring.
recipes.description: The Watchman, who is the Door-in-the-Eye, waits in my dreams. If I learn the Lantern-lore, and I dream of this temptation, I can advance my purpose. The need gnaws at me.

recipes.label: The Grail's Whispers
recipes.startdescription: Hungers roam my body - hungers for the pleasures that the invisible arts might bring.
recipes.description: The red cup, the cup of drowning and devouring, waits in my dreams. If I learn the Grail-lore, and I dream of this temptation, I can advance my purpose. The need gnaws at me.

recipes.label: The Shaping Heat
recipes.startdescription: I require ever hotter fires. Their fuel now is rare and costly. If I cannot afford them, the cold will overtake me.

recipes.label: The Ashes of Change
recipes.startdescription: I am shivering. Without the fire, my flesh will thin and weaken.
recipes.description: My strength is less. My blood is colder. I think that even some of my scars are healing. I diminish.

recipes.label: Another Mark
recipes.description: The flames yearn for me as I for them. Their touch is much more than pain. I have another Mark.

recipes.label: The Red Need

slots.label: Sustenance
slots.description: The recently dead, or the living.

recipes.startdescription: A thirst for blood? If only it were so simple. I will drain them far more deeply.

recipes.label: The Desert Inside
recipes.startdescription: Without the life of others, my own life will feed on itself.
recipes.description: My fluids thin; my flesh dessicates; my changes uncoil; my passions dim. I am becoming less than I want.

recipes.label: Another Mark
recipes.description: When I am done, the satisfaction is deep as the moon in the sea. Another Mark buds in me.

recipes.label: The Curiosities of Light

slots.label: Conversation
slots.description: The last words of a living mind.

recipes.startdescription: Time alone in a quiet room with a living mind. That's all I need.

recipes.label: The Desert Inside
recipes.startdescription: If I cannot consume the thoughts of a living mind, my need will turn in upon itself.
recipes.description: The Light of the Mansus dims in me. I am less than I was. I need conversation. I must have those particular conversations.

recipes.label: Another Mark
recipes.description: I have drunk the light of their mind. It thrills and fills me. The Marks brighten in me.

recipes.label: The Hunger that Grows in Dark Earth
recipes.startdescription: The taste - the particular taste - the taste which is neither fair nor foul - it comes to trouble my mouth again. My tongue will swell, my lips will blacken. The Elixir has set its spores within me, and only dead flesh can quell them.

recipes.label: The Hunger that Grows in Dark Earth
recipes.startdescription: The taste - the particular taste - the taste which is neither fair nor foul - it comes to trouble my mouth again. My tongue will swell, my lips will blacken. The Elixir has set its spores within me, and only dead flesh can quell them.
recipes.comments: This is a safety measure for players who managed to allow their hunger to go negative with an old save.

recipes.label: The Temptation of Change
recipes.startdescription: I long to be something else, but have I learnt the lesson I need before the witnesses I must have?

recipes.label: Garments, Surrendered
recipes.description: When I surrender the choices I have made, when the tree-filtered moon walks my surfaces, I grow light as a leaf.

recipes.label: Garments, Surrendered
recipes.description: I shuck my husk to grow. Here is the moon and here am I in its eye -

recipes.label: Toward the Second Change
recipes.startdescription: The skin I bear will grow too small, and so I must begin to abandon it. I will need to send a part of myself to learn how.

recipes.label: Integument, Surrendered
recipes.description: My outermost skin comes free in shreds and patches, and so do I.

recipes.label: Integument, Surrendered
recipes.description:
"We all are layers

but not so much I"

recipes.label: Toward the Third Change
recipes.startdescription: One reveals, one conceals, one reveals. To proceed, I must learn a lesson of concealment.

recipes.label: Steps, Surrendered
recipes.description: Without footsteps to follow, who will know our destination? I wish so very much to go.

recipes.label: Steps, Surrendered
recipes.description: Moldywarp's oldest lesson: between music, silence

recipes.label: Toward the Fourth Change
recipes.startdescription: For the next change, I must soften myself to receive the agencies of alteration.

recipes.label: Hues Surrendered
recipes.description: My newly paling flesh is rich with the juices of dissolution.

recipes.label: Hues, Surrendered
recipes.description: When I go into the last skin, all this me will dissolve, dapple dapple. So soon, dapple dapple.

recipes.label: Toward the Fifth Change
recipes.startdescription: The door I will pass is never visible to either the waking eye, or the eye that is closed. I must surrender those eyes to one who knows the way, so that I can see.

recipes.label: Sight, Surrendered
recipes.description: Sometimes, the citrine eyes of one who has undergone this change are mistaken for the illumined eyes of one approaching the Incursus. But never for long.

recipes.label: Sight, Surrendered
recipes.description: Now I enter my final skin.

recipes.label: The Pulse Inside
recipes.startdescription: I must dream soon, before my soul bursts.

recipes.label: Toward the Sixth Change
recipes.startdescription: The bones are always last. When I have learnt how they change, I will be ready.

recipes.label: Bones, Surrendered
recipes.description: Now that sun has set and the shadows are extinguished, it's time to remember, and I will remember with my bones, as I have been taught. I am almost ready.

recipes.label: Bones, Surrendered
recipes.description: Now that sun has fallen and the shadows have spread like oil, my bones know what must happen at the end. The end is very near.

recipes.label: The Same Self
recipes.description: I am no further along my path of change. In the movements of the secret Forms must I find my lesson.
